explanation: UT_LoadRetval directly calls UtAssert_GetContext (per the static call graph). To decide if UT_LoadRetval violates the MISRA rule against direct or indirect recursion you must examine the implementation or callee list of UtAssert_GetContext to see whether it (directly or via a chain of calls) calls UT_LoadRetval. No other callees are present in UT_LoadRetval, so UtAssert_GetContext is the only additional symbol required for determining any possible indirect recursion back to UT_LoadRetval.
